First Rmd file
========================================================
The code was taken from the source: http://linum.cofc.edu/bio611/Rmd/example-markdown.html

First enter data:

```{r}
height = 10
width = 5
length = 5
```

Can be calculated volume:

```{r fig.width=7, fig.height=6}
volume = height * width * length
```
